install.name: embedia
install.author: Ozgur Cem Sen
install.description:
!!! IMPORTANT !!! embedia will work only with PHP 5.1.2 and above. If you have an earlier version of PHP, sorry you're out of luck with embedia. Please uninstall embedia and try moseasymedia instead.
embedia bot is a content mambot that makes your life a lot easier when embedding media in your MiaCMS, Joomla!, Mambo.
Please take few seconds of your time and go to ".Mambots->Site Mambots->embedia" and click on embedia.
* Review the settings, make adjustments to your liking, select "Publish" / "Save". * If you will be embedding media from external sites, please make sure you comply with all the rules, regulations and policies of the host site. * You can find Tutorials and Troubleshooting instructions in our wiki * For tips and trick about embedding videos from other sites, such as YouTube, Vimeo, MySpace etc once again, our wiki is your friend. Many of the websites that you can embed videos from, use Flash based players. Most of the time, all you need to do is take a peek at the "embed" code they provide and concatenate the "movie" and "flashvars" params into one long URL and put in {embedia media=THE_LINK_COMES_HERE} . The idea is getting a direct link to the video. * embedia can handle moseasymedia tags. If you modified any CSS files, simply rename them with embedia prefix (instead of moseasymedia) and overwrite the css files under the embedia/includes/css directory.
Enjoy.
http://brilaps.com code (at) brilaps.com --------- *sorry, we didn't really want to deal with this formatting issue!

param.name: embedia_moseasymedia
param.label: Handle moseasymedia tags
param.description: Let embedia handle moseasymedia tags as well.

param.name: noscript
param.label: noscript
param.default: Please turn on javascript to view the media.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Popup Options *Read desc.
param.description: Settings for Popup options for embedia.

param.name: embedia_Popup_popup
param.label: Popup Window Style
param.description: Puts a link beneath the video to display in a popup window.Popup settings are NOT set PER Player, but can be overriden per the instance of the player on the page.

param.name: embedia_Popup_popupmediathumbnail
param.label: Popup Image
param.description: If given or overriden in the embedia tag, the image will be rendered instead of the media. Otherwise, the media code will be rendered. Popup style MUST NOT be None

param.name: embedia_Popup_popuplinktext
param.label: Popup Link Text
param.default: Click here to open in another window.
param.description: If Popup style is window, this text will be displayed beneath the video/audio, or image. When the user clicks on this, a javascript popup window will be launched.

param.name: embedia_Popup_popupwidth
param.label: PopupWidth
param.description: The width of the popup window

param.name: embedia_Popup_popupheight
param.label: PopupHeight
param.description: The height of the popup window

param.name: embedia_Popup_popuptoolbar
param.label: Show Toolbar
param.description: Show toolbar in a javascript popup browser window.

param.name: embedia_Popup_popupmenubar
param.label: Show Menubar
param.description: Show menubar in a javascript popup browser window.

param.name: embedia_Popup_popupscrollbars
param.label: Show Scrollbars
param.description: Show scrollbars in a javascript popup browser window.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Macromedia Flash
param.description: Settings for files to handled by Flash (http://www.macromedia.com). ***application/x-shockwave-flash

param.name: playerFlash
param.label: Player
param.description: DO NOT CHANGE THIS SETTING

param.name: classidFlash
param.label: classid
param.description: classid for this control

param.name: codebaseFlash
param.label: codebase
param.description: codebase for the player object

param.name: pluginspageFlash
param.label: Plugin Page
param.description: In case the plugin cannot be found on the visitor's computer, this link will point him to more information regarding this player.

param.name: embedia_UseJavascriptFlash
param.label: Use Javascript
param.description: Use javascript to generate the embedding code. Using this option will NOT break your page validation.

param.name: embedia_ExtensionsFlash
param.label: Extensions
param.description: File extensions to be handled by Flash

param.name: typeFlash
param.label: Type
param.description: MIME Type

param.name: widthFlash
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the player

param.name: heightFlash
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the player

param.name: qualityFlash
param.label: Quality
param.description: Quality of media

param.name: playFlash
param.label: Auto Play
param.description: Auto play

param.name: wmodeFlash
param.label: Window Mode
param.description: Sets the window mode of the flash object

param.name: bgcolorFlash
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Background color will NOT work in -window- mode

param.name: loopFlash
param.label: Loop
param.description: Loop media

param.name: allowscriptaccessFlash
param.label: AllowScriptAccess
param.description: AllowScriptAccess within the flash video

param.name: embedia_CSSFlash
param.label: CSS
param.description: CSS class to handle this player

param.name: embedia_MediaSharingWebsitesUsingFlash
param.label: Video(audio) Sharing Websites Using Flash
param.description: If the the type can not be determined from the extension, This parm will be checked to see, if the media is from google, youtube, yahoo etc...

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Apple Quicktime

param.description: DO NOT CHANGE THIS SETTING

param.label: Type

param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the player

param.name: heightQuicktime
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the player

param.name: autoplayQuicktime
param.label: Auto Play
param.description: Auto start

param.name: scaleQuicktime
param.label: Scale
param.description: Scale to fit the box or keep the aspect ratio and fit

param.name: kioskmodeQuicktime
param.label: Kiosk Mode
param.description: The plug-in does not include its pop-up menu in the movie controller and does not allow drag and drop to save the movie.

param.name: cacheQuicktime
param.label: Cache
param.description: If CACHE=TRUE is specified, the browser will CACHE movies. If the movie is in CACHE when the user returns to the page, the movie will be played from CACHE instead of downloading again.

param.name: controllerQuicktime
param.label: Show controller
param.description: Show Controller

param.name: loopQuicktime
param.label: Loop
param.description: Loop media

param.name: volumeQuicktime
param.label: Volume
param.description: Default volume level, between 0-100

param.name: bgcolorQuicktime
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Background color of the player

param.name: embedia_CSSQuicktime
param.label: CSS
param.description: CSS class to handle this player

param.name: embedia_MediaSharingWebsitesUsingQuicktime
param.label: Video(audio) Sharing Websites Using Quicktime
param.description: If the the type can not be determined from the extension, This parm will be checked to see, if the media is from google, youtube, yahoo etc...

param.name: embedia_ExtensionsRealPlayer
param.label: Extensions
param.description: File extensions to be handled by RealPlayer

param.name: typeRealPlayer
param.label: Type
param.description: MIME Type

param.name: widthRealPlayer
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the player

param.name: heightRealPlayer
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the player

param.name: autostartRealPlayer
param.label: Auto Start
param.description: Auto start

param.name: controlsRealPlayer
param.label: Controls
param.description: Default controls for RealPlayer - these are extendible by changing this xml file

param.name: loopRealPlayer
param.label: Loop
param.description: Loop media

param.name: centerRealPlayer
param.label: Center
param.description: The default value for CENTER is false, which causes the clip to fill the entire playback area. If you set CENTER to true, the clip is centered within the playback area and is displayed at its encoded size. So by setting CENTER to true, you can create a large playback area with WIDTH and HEIGHT and still have the clip play at its normal size. You cannot use CENTER along with MAINTAINASPECT.

param.name: maintainaspectRealPlayer
param.label: Maintain Aspect
param.description: Maintain aspect ratio of the media.

param.name: embedia_CSSRealPlayer
param.label: CSS
param.description: CSS class to handle this player

param.name: embedia_MediaSharingWebsitesUsingRealPlayer
param.label: Video(audio) Sharing Websites Using RealPlayer
param.description: If the the type can not be determined from the extension, This parm will be checked to see, if the media is from google, youtube, yahoo etc...

param.label: Controls

param.name: allowcontextmenuDivX
param.label: Allow Context Menu
param.description: Allow right click on player

param.name: loopDivX
param.label: Center
param.description: Loop playback

param.name: bufferingmodeDivX
param.label: Buffering Mode
param.description: The bufferingMode parameter is used to specify how the plug-in should buffer downloaded data before attempting to start playback.

param.name: previewimageDivX
param.label: Preview Image
param.description: The previewImage parameter is used to specify the location of an image file in PNG, JPEG or GIF format to use as a preview image. The preview image is displayed in place of the DivX X logo when autoPlay is set to false

param.name: previewmessageDivX
param.label: Preview Message
param.description: The previewMessage parameter allows to display a text message on top of the preview image to let users know how to start the video.

param.name: embedia_CSSDivX
param.label: CSS
param.description: CSS class to handle this player

param.name: embedia_MediaSharingWebsitesUsingDivX
param.label: Video(audio) Sharing Websites Using DivX
param.description: If the the type can not be determined from the extension, This parm will be checked to see, if the media is from google, youtube, yahoo etc...

param.name: @spacer
param.label: JWMediaPlayer
param.description: Settings Jeron Wijering's Media Player. Please check http://www.jeroenwijering.com/?item=Flash+Video+Player

param.name: playerJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Player
param.description: DO NOT CHANGE THIS SETTING

param.name: classidJWMediaPlayer
param.label: classid
param.description: classid for this control

param.name: codebaseJWMediaPlayer
param.label: codebase
param.description: codebase for the player object

param.name: pluginspageJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Plugin Page
param.description: In case the plugin cannot be found on the visitor's computer, this link will point him to more information regarding this player.

param.name: embedia_UseJavascriptJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Use Javascript
param.description: Use javascript to generate the embedding code. Using this option will NOT break your page validation.

param.name: embedia_ExtensionsJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Extensions
param.description: File extensions to be handled by JWMediaPlayer

param.name: typeJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Type
param.description: MIME Type

param.name: widthJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the player

param.name: heightJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the player

param.name: displayheightJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Display Height
param.description: This flashvar is used by the players and sets the height of the display. It defaults to the height of the SWF object minus the controlbar (20px), but if you set it to a smaller height, the playlist will show up. If you set it to the height of the player itself (or larger), the controlbar will auto-hide over the video.

param.name: logoJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Logo URL
param.description: Set this flashvar to put a watermark logo in the top right corner of the display. All image formats are supported, but transparent PNG files give the best results.

param.name: backcolorJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Backgroundcolor of the player

param.name: frontcolorJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Front Color
param.description: Texts / buttons color of the player

param.name: lightJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Light Color
param.description: Rollover/ active color of the player

param.name: overstretchJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Stretch
param.description: Defines how to stretch images/movies to make them fit the display. true will stretch them proportionally to fill the display, false will stretch them to fit. fit will stretch them disproportionally to fit both height and width. none will show all items in their original dimensions. Defaults to fit.

param.name: shownavigationJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Show Navigation
param.description: enables/disables the navigation bar

param.name: autostartJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Auto Start
param.description: To make the player automatically start playing when the page loads. muted option will autostart with the volume set to 0 and an unmute icon in the display.

param.name: volumeJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Volume
param.description: Default volume level, between 0-100

param.name: bufferlengthJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Buffer Length
param.description: This sets the number of seconds an FLV should be buffered ahead before the player starts it. Set this smaller for fast connections or short videos. Set this bigger for slow connections. The default is 3 seconds.

param.name: repeatJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Loop
param.description: By default, the players will stop playback after every item to preserve bandwidth (repeat=false). You can set this to list to playback all items in a playlist once, or to true to continously playback your song/movie/playlist.

param.name: largecontrolsJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Large Controls
param.description: Makes the controlbar twice as large.

param.name: wmodeJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Window Mode
param.description: Sets the window mode of the flash object

param.name: shuffleJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Shuffle playlist
param.description: Shuffles your playlist. You can check ocszone.com for more info about RSS, XSPF playlist

param.name: allowscriptaccessJWMediaPlayer
param.label: AllowScriptAccess
param.description: AllowScriptAccess within the flash video

param.name: CSSJWMediaPlayer
param.label: CSS
param.description: CSS class to handle this player

param.name: embedia_MediaSharingWebsitesUsingJWMediaPlayer
param.label: Video(audio) Sharing Websites Using JW Media Player
param.description: If the the type can not be determined from the extension, This parm will be checked to see, if the media is from google, youtube, yahoo etc...

param.label: JWMP3Player
param.description: Settings for FLV files to handled by Jeron Wijering's FLV Player. You need Flash Player (for FLV) for this. Please check http://www.jeroenwijering.com/?item=Flash+Video+Player

param.name: info_button_textXSPFPlayer
param.label: Info Button
param.description: the text to display on the info link

param.name: embedia_modeXSPFPlayer
param.label: Display Mode
param.description: Display the slim or extended version of the player

param.name: autoplayXSPFPlayer
param.label: Auto Play
param.description: boolean value that make the music start without the initial user click

param.name: autoloadXSPFPlayer
param.label: Auto Load
param.description: boolean value that make the playlist load without the initial user click.

param.name: repeat_playlistXSPFPlayer
param.label: Loop
param.description: boolean value that make the repeats the playlist after the end of the last song.

param.name: CSSXSPFPlayer
param.label: CSS

param.name: embedia_MediaSharingWebsitesUsingXSPFPlayer
param.label: Video(audio) Sharing Websites Using XSPF Player
param.description: If the the type can not be determined from the extension, This parm will be checked to see, if the media is from google, youtube, yahoo etc...
